issue.title: [CF 290] Add grayscale option for spells/items on CD
issue.body:
Similar to opacity setting currently available when spell/item is unusable, add option to grayscale icon while on CD and remove timer's edge. With OmniCC timer in the middle, that would possibly provide for cleaner look and more visible timers.


> Posted by CurseForge user Orego | Imported from CurseForge issue #290 | Raw

comments.body:
What do you mean by "timer's edge"?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

The default rotating line inside of icon indicating remaining cool down.

Edited Sep 16, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Orego

Just added the ability to hide the cooldown sweep animation in r228: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/312-r228/

Edited Sep 16, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Tested on r230 and works great. Would it still be possible to add grayscale option? Thank you!


> Posted by CurseForge user Orego

I'm not ruling it out, but the current framework doesn't really support it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

You wish is my command (2 months later)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
